response.job_title: Software Engineer | 7 years' experience | best practices » React JS, Vanilla JS, Backend, FullStack
response.summary:
Software Engineer with 7 years of hands-on experience, graduated from National University of Colombia.

I transitioned between the different layers of Software Engineering, my favourites are the Backend and Frontend Development, lately mastering that one: JavaScript and React.

I make use of best practices, version control systems, documentation, agile methodologies, and different design patterns.

Languages :
Javascript ES6, Java, Ruby ----- Python, C

FrontEnd : 
React JS, FP, Redux, Sagas, yarn, HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla JS

Backend:
Ruby on Rails, RESTful Services, OOP, AWS

Database :
SQL PostgreSQL, MySQL
NoSQL Google Datastore

Other :
Digital Image Processing, pattern recognition
Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator

Tools :
Git, GitLab, VSCode, Jira,  Docker, Tableau
response.skills: Vanilla JavaScript, Software Development, JavaScript, React.js, Android Development, Algorithms, Web Development, Data Analysis, Java, Python, SQL, NoSQL, Ruby on Rails, Adobe Photoshop, Flash, SketchUp, Databases, Adobe Illustrator, Git, HTML5

company.name: ConfigureID
company.description:
ConfigureID is the leading product personalization platform for premium brands. 

Our intuitive interface, photorealistic visualization, and sophisticated configuration logic enable your brand to drive ecommerce conversion and value, while increasing product margins and loyalty. 

Shoppers from around the globe add over 5 million personalized products to their carts every year with ConfigureID.

Premium brands including Louis Vuitton, Ray-Ban, Oakley, Ralph Lauren, Michael Kors, Yankee Candle, Fender, and Franklin Sports leverage the ConfigureID platform to power their online product customization and personalization experiences.

What are you waiting for? Get in touch with us today to see a free demo of ConfigureID and learn how to take your brand and products to the next level with premium product personalization. 

https://configureid.com/request-demo/
